WorkItem.Description:
Cell A1 contains formula:
=DATEVALUE("15:50")
 
Test:
----
$excel = PHPExcel_IOFactory::load('datevalue.xlsx');
$worksheet = $excel->getActiveSheet();
 
var_dump($worksheet->getCell('A1')->getCalculatedValue());
 
Expected result:
----
float 0
 
Actual result:
----
float 40195
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.2
WorkItem.Summary: DATEVALUE function not working for pure time values
